summary: Completed comprehensive responsive design testing for Antia platform across mobile (390x844), tablet (768x1024), and desktop (1920x800) viewports. All 3 dashboards (tipster, client, admin) have properly implemented collapsible sidebars with hamburger menu on mobile/tablet and visible sidebar on desktop.
critical_code_review_comments: Responsive sidebar implementation is correct using -translate-x-full lg:translate-x-0 pattern
Tailwind safelist in tailwind.config.ts correctly includes transform classes
Sidebar closes after navigation on mobile (handleMobileNav function)
Statistics grids adapt correctly on different viewports
Login and register pages are fully responsive
context_for_next_testing_agent: Responsive design fully tested. All 3 dashboards (tipster, client, admin) have collapsible sidebars that work correctly: hidden on mobile/tablet (<1024px) with hamburger menu, visible on desktop (>=1024px). The sidebar uses CSS classes: -translate-x-full lg:translate-x-0 for hiding/showing, and !translate-x-0 when opened via hamburger menu. Navigation closes sidebar on mobile. Home page, login page, and register page are all responsive.
